verses.verse: <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them; <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H376>What<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> soever there be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that <S%H7819>kills<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3775>lamb,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5795>goat,<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that <S%H7819>kills<s%> it out of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%>

And <S%H935>brings<s%> it not to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H2803>imputed<s%> to that <S%H376>man;<s%> he has <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and that <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people:<s%>

To the <S%H4616>end<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H2076>offer<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> even that they may <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H2076>offer<s%> them for <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2076>offer<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> to <S%H8163>devils,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992><s%> they have gone a <S%H2181>whoring.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to them throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H376>Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> there be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, that <S%H5927>offers<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%>

And <S%H935>brings<s%> it not to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> to <S%H6213>offer<s%> it to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> even that <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from among his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H376>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> there be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, that <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> manner of <S%H1818>blood;<s%> I will even <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> him off from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

For the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is in the <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to you on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls:<s%> for it is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that makes an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> of you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And <S%H376>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> there be of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6679>hunts<s%> and <S%H6679>catches<s%> any <S%H2416>beast<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> that may be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> he shall even <S%H8210>pour<s%> out the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof, and <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

For it is the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of it is for the <S%H5315>life<s%> thereof: therefore I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3808>no<s%> manner of <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof: <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> it shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eats<s%> that which <S%H5038>died<s%> of itself, or that which was <S%H2966>torn<s%> with <S%H2966>beasts,<s%> whether it be one of your <S%H249>own<s%> <S%H249>country,<s%> or a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> he shall both <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even:<s%> then shall he be <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H3526>wash<s%> them not, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
